definition: to cast/to send/to throw oneself (into the river etc)/to seek refuge/to place oneself into the hands of
Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)

sentences.english: Do we want All Risks Cover?
I'll have the goods covered against Free from Particular Average.
sentences.chinese: 我将为货物投保平安险。

sentences.english: Proposed Insured must be one of the Insured Person(s).
sentences.chinese: 投保人必须为其中一名受保人。

sentences.english: But when the policyholder is mortgages people, the situation should be different.
sentences.chinese: 但是如果投保人是抵押权人时，情况又有所不同。

sentences.english: Please insure FPA on this shipment.
sentences.chinese: 请为这批货投保平安险。

sentences.english: I am looking for insurance from your company.
Policy-holder is handing in before two years of cost, expenses expenses is larger.
sentences.chinese: 投保人在交费的前两年，费用开支较大。

sentences.english: His policy covered heart transplants, but not the cost of the mechanical pump.
sentences.chinese: 他的投保范围包括了心脏移植，但是没有涵盖机械泵。

sentences.english: What percentage of your professional services is subcontracted to others?
sentences.chinese: 投保人分出该业务的份额是多少？

sentences.english: The coverage is W.P.A. plus Risk of Breakage。
sentences.chinese: 投保的险别为水渍险加破碎险。

sentences.english: People without insurance have to pay for their own repair.
sentences.chinese: 未投保者需自付修理费。

sentences.english: But judging from the recent situation in Kosovo, I think War Risk should be covered.
sentences.chinese: 但是从科所沃目前的形势看，我认为应该投保战争险。

sentences.english: This insurance policy insures us against All Risks.
sentences.chinese: 本保险单为我们投保了一切险。

sentences.english: Has any of the equipment to be insured previously been covered by other insurance companies?
sentences.chinese: 电子设备中有无已在其他保险公司投保？

sentences.english: Cargo insurance does not cover theft or dishonesty by the party that is insured.
sentences.chinese: 若投保方偷窃或骗保，货物保险不会赔付。

definition: to settle a claim/claims settlement/payment of claims
to get out of trouble/to escape from danger/a danger appears/threatened by danger
the insured person/the person covered by an insurance policy
life insurance/abbr. for 人壽保險|人寿保险
